statements: SELECT * FROM attendance;
SELECT program_name, participant_name FROM attendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, program_name, event_date, participant_name, attendance_status FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT participant_name FROM attendance WHERE program_name LIKE '%Workshop%';
SELECT id, event_date FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT program_name, participant_name FROM attendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_name, attendance_status FROM attendance WHERE program_name LIKE '%workshop%' ORDER BY event_date DESC, participant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent' AND event_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT attendee_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE event_date = '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM Programs WHERE program_name = 'Workshop' ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM Programs WHERE program_description LIKE '%advanced%' ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status IN ('Present', 'Late') ORDER BY event_date ASC, attendee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendee_id = 1 AND event_id = 2;
SELECT event_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM Attendance GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT attendee_id, event_date, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM Programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT event_id) AS total_events, COUNT(DISTINCT attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM Attendance;
SELECT * FROM programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM programs WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM programs WHERE capacity < 50;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM programs;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM events WHERE location='Conference Room';
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date='2021-10-15';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, capacity FROM programs WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT name, age FROM attendees;
SELECT attendee_id, name, age, email FROM attendees;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM programs;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT name, age, email FROM attendees WHERE age > 25;
SELECT program_name, program_description, start_date, end_date FROM programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location, capacity FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT a.name, e.event_name, p.registration_date FROM attendees a JOIN participation p ON a.attendee_id = p.attendee_id JOIN events e ON e.event_id = p.event_id WHERE e.capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Participants;
SELECT program_name, program_leader FROM Programs WHERE program_leader LIKE '%John%';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_phone FROM Participants WHERE participant_phone IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_leader FROM Programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM Events JOIN Attendance ON Events.event_id = Attendance.event_id WHERE Attendance.participant_id = 5;
